attributes.action: The Right To Register A Miscarriage / Stillbirth Before 24 Weeks!
attributes.additional_details: I lost my baby at 15 weeks gestation and i have been battling for ages now to purchase a plot for him so i can have a headstone, something to go to when i need to i feel at the moment like he never even existed after speaking to numerous companys, graveyards, funeral directors i have just been repetedly told that i am not aloud to buy a plot because i do not have a birth or a death certificate for my little man this rule needs to be changed, its horrible knowing that our children will never be recognised!
